```{r}
pacman::p_load(scatterPlotMatrix, parallelPlot, cluster, factoextra, tidyverse)
```

```{r}
wine <- read.csv("data/wine_quality.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = wine,
       aes(x = type)) +
  geom_bar()
```

Dropping column 12 and column 13 to make data cleaner

```{r}
whitewine <- wine %>%
  filter(type =="white") %>%
  select(c(1:11))
```

```{r}
scatterPlotMatrix(whitewine,
                  corrPlotType = "Text",
                  distribType = 1,
                  width = 500,
                  height = 500)
```

## Clustering

```{r}
set.seed(123)
kmeans4 <- kmeans(whitewine, 4, nstart = 25)
print(kmeans4)
```

```{r}
fviz_cluster(kmeans4, data = whitewine)
```

```{r}
whitewine <- whitewine %>%
  mutate(Cluster = kmeans4$Cluster)
```
